Name: Die drei Freunde von der Reitschule
About the game: Slip into the role of Laura and save the riding school from demolition! - Groom and train the horses of the riding school, win the preliminary decisions and improve your riding skills. - Ride your horse through a great and extensive natural landscape! Can you clear up the mysterious accident with your two friends and still save the riding school from sinking?
